item.name: Bytes Read
item.description: Average number of bytes read (sequential and random).

item.name: Bytes Written
item.description: Average number of bytes written pr. second.

item.name: Data Usage
item.description: Total number of bytes used on disk for volumes.

item.name: diskSnapBytesUsedHigh.0
item.description: Total number of bytes used on disk for snapshots - high order bytes.

item.name: diskSnapBytesUsedLow.0
item.description: Total number of bytes used on disk for snapshots - low order bytes.

item.name: diskVolBytesUsedHigh.0
item.description: Total number of bytes used on disk for volumes - high order bytes.

item.name: diskVolBytesUsedLow.0
item.description: Total number of bytes used on disk for volumes - low order bytes.

item.name: Non-sequential Read IOps
item.description: Average number of cached non-sequential read IOps.

item.name: Read IOps
item.description: Average number of read IOps (sequential and random).

item.name: Sequential Bytes Read
item.description: Average number of sequential bytes read pr. second.

item.name: Sequential Bytes Written
item.description: Average number of sequential bytes written pr. second.

item.name: Sequential Read IOps
item.description: Average number of sequential read IOps.

item.name: Sequential Write IOps
item.description: Average number of write IOps (sequential and random).

item.name: Snapshot Usage
item.description: Total number of bytes used on disk for snapshots.

item.name: Total Usage
item.description: Total number of bytes used on disk.

item.name: Writes IOps
item.description: Average number of write IOps (sequential and random).

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} - Data Usage
item_prototype.description: Current number of bytes a volume is using.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} - IOps Read
item_prototype.description: Average number of Read IOps (sequential and random).

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} - IOps Read Latency 0.0-0.1ms
item_prototype.description: Number of read I/O's with latency between 0 and 100 microseconds.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} - IOps Read Latency 0.1-0.2ms
item_prototype.description: Number of read I/O's with latency between 100 and 200 microseconds.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} - IOps Read Latency 0.2-0.5ms
item_prototype.description: Number of read I/O's with latency between 200 and 500 microseconds.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} - IOps Read Latency 0.5-1.0ms
item_prototype.description: Number of read I/O's with latency between 0.5 and 1 milliseconds.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} - IOps Read Latency 1.0-2.0ms
item_prototype.description: Number of read I/O's with latency between 1 and 2 milliseconds.

item_prototype.description: Number of read I/O's with latency between 2 and 5 milliseconds.

item_prototype.description: Number of read I/O's with latency between 5 and 10 milliseconds.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} - IOps Read Latency 10-20ms
item_prototype.description: Number of read I/O's with latency between 10 and 20 milliseconds.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} - IOps Read Latency 20-50ms
item_prototype.description: Number of read I/O's with latency between 20 and 50 milliseconds.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} - IOps Read Latency 50-100ms
item_prototype.description: Number of read I/O's with latency between 50 and 100 milliseconds.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} - IOps Read Latency 100-200ms
item_prototype.description: Number of read I/O's with latency between 100 and 200 milliseconds.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} - IOps Read Latency 200-500ms
item_prototype.description: Number of read I/O's with latency between 200 and 500 milliseconds.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} - IOps Read Latency 500->
item_prototype.description: Number of read I/O's with latency above 500 milliseconds.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} - IOps Write
item_prototype.description: Average number of Write IOps (sequential and random).

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} - Non-sequential Read IOps
item_prototype.description: Average number of total non-sequential read I/O's.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} - Non-sequential Read IOps From Memory
item_prototype.description: Average number of non-sequential read I/O's served from memory.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} - Non-sequential Read IOps From SSD
item_prototype.description: Average number of non-sequential read I/O's served from SSD.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} - Online State
item_prototype.description: Volume Online (true or false).

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} - Sequential Bps Read
item_prototype.description: Average number of sequential bytes read pr. second.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} - Sequential Bps Write
item_prototype.description: Average number of sequential bytes written pr. second.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} - Sequential Read IOps
item_prototype.description: Average number of sequential read IOps.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} - Sequential Write IOps
item_prototype.description: Average number of sequential write IOps.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} - Total Size
item_prototype.description: Maximum defined size of a volume in bytes.
